main event: Radar operators reported a UFO sighting in Madison, Wisconsin, in early April 1959, where an object was tracked on radar making a 180-degree turn near a lake.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 10 minutes,The object made an extremely tight turn while maintaining a constant distance between two radar stations,Simultaneous sightings were reported by radar operators at Madison and Antigo,The object was classified as possibly being an aircraft,It was noted that the radar operators had previous sightings that correlated with this event.
witness description: Radar operators at Madison and Antigo
